channel.title: The Christian Transhumanist Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Micah Redding and Amy Gaskin explore Christianity and Transhumanism, diving deep into the relationship between religion, technology, and the future of the human race.

item.title: Ep 1: Conversations: What is Transhumanism?
item.itunes:subtitle: In this first episode, Micah Redding and Amy Gaskin ask the question 'What is Transhumanism?', and then go on to explore the landscape at the intersection of Christianity and Transhumanist thought.
